age: Role: Feature, Description: Age of primary beneficiary.
sex: Role: Feature, Description: Insurance contractor gender, female, male.
bmi: Role: Feature, Description: Body mass index, providing an understanding of body, weights that are relatively high or low relative to height, objective index of body weight (kg / m ^ 2) using the ratio of height to weight, ideally 18.5 to 24.9.
children: Role: Feature, Description: Number of children covered by health insurance / Number of dependents.
smoker: Role: Feature, Description: This column indicates if the ensured person smokes or not.
region: Role: Feature, Description: The beneficiary's residential area in the US: northeast, southeast, southwest, northwest..
charges: Role: Target, Description: Individual medical costs billed by health insurance.
